abstract.t: This document defines a framework for providing Energy Management for devices and device components within or connected to communication networks. The framework defines both a physical reference model and information model. The information model consists of an Energy Management Domain as a set of Energy Objects. Each Energy Object is identified, classified and given context. Energy Objects can be monitored and controlled with respect to Power, Power State, Energy, Demand, Power Attributes, and Battery. Additionally the framework models relationships and capabilities between Energy Objects.
